title: Transformative Instructional Design Scenarios for Nursing Science Philosophy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of nursing and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Non-degree course conducted in smartphone-based restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the philosophical paradigms of nursing science research
Learners can systematically establish and present a personal nursing science philosophy
Learners can express their identity as nursing scientists by utilizing academic writing and presentation skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
